author: Lindsay
text: Such a beautiful piece for our home! Love it!

author: nicola217
text: It was a pleasure working with Ashley on this custom piece (my second purchase from her shop). Her work is wonderful!

author: nicola217
text: The piece is beautiful and it was a pleasure coordinating/communicating with Ashley. Loved it so much I bought a second piece!

author: Ishabel
text: I absolutely love this piece - throughout the whole process Ashley has been quick to respond with any questions I have - the piece is very well made, colours merge beautifully together and clearly time has been taken to get it just right  - only thing is be aware of customs charge if ordering in the UK (¬£175) but it was worth it - would highly recommend

author: Rebecca
text: Moved into our new home a couple months ago and I knew I needed a tapestry from BadScandi! Ashley did a wonderful job working with me to create what I envisioned and I couldn't be happier with how it turned out!

author: Momma
text:
Couldn't be happier with this beautiful fiber art; it's just what my room needed. It feels luxurious, even better in person than in photos. 

Thank you bad scandi. You are so talented üíôü§éü§ç

author: Sarah
text: Love my new tapestry! The colours work perfectly in my office space. Ashley was great to deal with as well! Highly recommend!!!

author: Sara
text: Beautiful piece, just as pictured! Love it and it arrived quickly.
